An internal e-commerce for ordering office stationery and housekeeping

Office stationery and housekeeping is a definite need by all departments in the Faculty of Engineering UGM, and it becomes a problem when the cost for operations (e.g. stamps) reaches a high number compared to the goods purchased, because stamps are needed for every purchase bill made.

So this service becomes an internal e-commerce to meet the needs of office stationery and housekeeping of all existing departments. That is by cooperating with a partner provider, where the payment is made once a month. Thus the expenditure of funds for the purchase of stamps can be saved.
